Item.Value: Hey. $Name$ right? $Character_11$ told us you were moving in soon. I'm $Character_13$ $Character_14$'s husband. I make and seel furniture if you ever have need any,
I hear you're an artisan right? That sounds so much more interesting than what I do. Do you enjoy it?
Hey, $Name$. You ever have one of those days where you just feel like you can't do anything right? Yeah. Hope your day is going better at least.
Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you? {Talk:Talk|Construct Buildings:BuyBuildings|Maintain Buildings:Maintenance|Never Mind:Cancel}
What? I haven't done anything to deserve this. Thank you.
What do you want to do?{Upgrade Buildings:UpgradeBuilding|Move Buildings:Move|Destroy Buildings:Destroy}
This is!? No. how did you get this? I don't... I can't... Really? Thank you so much!
My mother used to tell me stories of monsters that came out when it was raining. I know she just made them up but, sometimes, I can't help but wonder, you know?
Brr, I hope you've got some warm clothing on today. I always make $Character_14$ a cup of tea on days like this.
